name: EPF Partners
overview: EPF Partners is a private equity firm specializing in capital expansion funds management, growth capital, owner’s buyouts, middle market, management and leveraged buyouts and buy-ins, PIPES, and recapitalization. It also invests in companies with a view to being listed on the stock market. It does not undertake start-up or turnaround investments. The firm seeks to invest in all the sectors including distribution; information technology; software; industrials; business services; communication; media; leisure and healthcare sectors. The firm typically invests in Continental Europe mainly in France but also invests in Germany, Spain, and Italy. The firm usually makes equity investments between Ð‚3 million ($4.53 million) and Ð‚9 million ($13.58 million) in companies with sales value between Ð‚10 million ($14.29 million) and Ð‚100 million ($142.95 million). It generally takes a minority stake in its portfolio companies. The firm was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Paris, France. EPF Partners operates as a subsidiary of Natixis Private Equity.
